thread.title: Former Russia player Filippenkov dies during friendly game
thread.title_full: Former Russia player Filippenkov dies during friendly game

author: wtopstaff
title: Former Russia player Filippenkov dies during friendly game
text:
Home » News » Sports » Former Russia player Filippenkov… Former Russia player Filippenkov dies during friendly game By The Associated Press October 16, 2015 9:02 am 
MOSCOW (AP) — A former Russia international has died after collapsing on the field during a friendly game for ex-professional soccer players. 
Sergei Filippenkov, who made one appearance for Russia in a friendly against Brazil in 1998, was playing Thursday at Russian club Zenit Penza along with other former players. Filippenkov, who was 44, was the coach of the third-tier club. 
Zenit says Filippenkov scored a goal before becoming ill five minutes before the end. 
Filippenkov played for CSKA Moscow from 1998-2001, finishing second in the Russian league and reaching a Russian Cup final. 
After taking his first head coaching job with Zenit Penza last year, Filippenkov built the team into a promotion contender. Topics:
